subject: MCDG
name: FTE: Master's
info: (No description)prereq: Master's student, adviser and DGS consent

subject: MCDG
name: FTE: Doctoral
info: (No description)prereq: Doctoral student, adviser and DGS consent

subject: MCDG
name: Doct Pre-Thesis Cr
info: TBDprereq: Doctoral student who has not passed prelim oral; no required consent for 1st/2nd registrations, up to 12 combined cr; dept consent for 3rd/4th registrations, up to 24 combined cr; doctoral student admitted before summer 2007 may register up to four times, up to 60 combined cr

subject: MCDG
name: Thesis Credit:Mast*
info: (No description)prereq: Max 18 cr per semester or summer; 10 cr total required [Plan A only]

subject: MCDG
name: Thesis Credit:Doct*
info: (No description)prereq: Max 18 cr per semester or summer; 24 cr required

subject: MCDG
name: Stu. Res. Seminar
info: Presentation/discussion of student thesis research.prereq: Grad MCDG or BMBB major dept consent

subject: MCDG
name: Journal Pres.
info: Discussion of original scientific literature.prereq: Grad MCDG or BMBB major or dept consent

subject: MCDG
name: MCDG Special Topics
info: Special Topics Course in the Molecular, Cellular, Developmental Biology and Genetics Program, including Itasca Research.prereq: Grad MCDG or BMBB major or dept consent

subject: MCDG
name: MCDG Teach Prac
info: Supervised experience in classroom, laboratory, and/or recitation instruction; development of skills in effective use of instructional techniques, materials, tests, and measurements.prereq: Grad MCDG major or dept consent

subject: MCDG
name: Directed Studies
info: Directed Studies.prereq: MCDG grad student or instr consent

subject: MCDG
name: Research
info: Independent research determined by student's interests, in consultation with faculty mentor.prereq: MCDG  grad student or dept consent
